file.name: azure.com-sql-virtualclusters-2015-05-01-preview-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs
    that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The
    API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases,
    servers, and other entities.
  title: SqlManagementClient
  version: 2015-05-01-preview
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - cloud
  x-logo:
    url: https://assets.onestore.ms/cdnfiles/onestorerolling-1606-01000/shell/v3/images/logo/microsoft.png
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-rest-api-specs/master/specification/sql/resource-manager/Microsoft.Sql/preview/2015-05-01-preview/virtualclusters.json
      version: "2.0"
  x-providerName: azure.com
  x-serviceName: sql-virtualclusters
  x-tags:
    - Azure
    - Microsoft
paths:
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters":
    get:
      description: Gets a list of all virtualClusters in the subscription.
      operationId: VirtualClusters_List
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionIdParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersionParameter"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully retrieved the list of virtual clusters.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualClusterListResult"
              examples:
                List virtualClusters:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_virtualClusters"
        default:
          description: "*** Error Responses: ***"
      tags:
        - VirtualClusters
      x-ms-pageable:
        nextLinkName: nextLink
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters":
    get:
      description: Gets a list of virtual clusters in a resource group.
      operationId: VirtualClusters_ListByResourceGroup
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionIdParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersionParameter"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully retrieved the list of virtual clusters.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualClusterListResult"
              examples:
                List virtual clusters by resource group:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_virtual_clusters_by_resource_gr\
                    oup"
        default:
          description: >-
            *** Error Responses: ***

             * 400 SubscriptionNotFound - The requested subscription was not found.

             * 400 ManagementServiceFeatureDisabled - User attempted to use a feature which is disabled.

             * 404 ResourceDoesNotExist - Resource with the name '{0}' does not exist. To continue, specify a valid resource name.

             * 404 VirtualClusterNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - specified virtual cluster does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

             * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveVirtualCluster - The requested virtual cluster was not found

             * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

             * 409 ConflictingVirtualClusterOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the virtual cluster.

             * 429 ConflictingSubscriptionOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the subscription.
      tags:
        - VirtualClusters
      x-ms-pageable:
        nextLinkName: nextLink
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/{virtualClusterName}":
    delete:
      description: Deletes a virtual cluster.
      operationId: VirtualClusters_Delete
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VirtualClusterNameParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionIdParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersionParameter"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully deleted the virtual cluster.
        "202":
          description: Deleting the virtual cluster is in progress.
        "204":
          description: The specified virtual cluster does not exist.
        default:
          description: >-
            *** Error Responses: ***

             * 400 SubscriptionNotFound - The requested subscription was not found.

             * 400 ManagementServiceFeatureDisabled - User attempted to use a feature which is disabled.

             * 404 ResourceDoesNotExist - Resource with the name '{0}' does not exist. To continue, specify a valid resource name.

             * 404 VirtualClusterNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - specified virtual cluster does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

             * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveVirtualCluster - The requested virtual cluster was not found

             * 404 OperationIdNotFound - The operation with Id does not exist.

             * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

             * 409 ConflictingVirtualClusterOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the virtual cluster.

             * 409 OperationCancelled - The operation has been cancelled by user.

             * 409 OperationInterrupted - The operation on the resource could not be completed because it was interrupted by another operation on the same resource.

             * 429 ConflictingSubscriptionOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the subscription.

             * 500 OperationTimedOut - The operation timed out and automatically rolled back. Please retry the operation.
      tags:
        - VirtualClusters
      x-ms-long-running-operation: true
    get:
      description: Gets a virtual cluster.
      operationId: VirtualClusters_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VirtualClusterNameParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionIdParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersionParameter"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully retrieved the specified virtual cluster.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualCluster"
              examples:
                Get virtual cluster:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_virtual_cluster"
        default:
          description: >-
            *** Error Responses: ***

             * 400 SubscriptionNotFound - The requested subscription was not found.

             * 400 ManagementServiceFeatureDisabled - User attempted to use a feature which is disabled.

             * 404 ResourceDoesNotExist - Resource with the name '{0}' does not exist. To continue, specify a valid resource name.

             * 404 VirtualClusterNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - specified virtual cluster does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

             * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveVirtualCluster - The requested virtual cluster was not found

             * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

             * 409 ConflictingVirtualClusterOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the virtual cluster.

             * 429 ConflictingSubscriptionOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the subscription.
      tags:
        - VirtualClusters
    patch:
      description: Updates a virtual cluster.
      operationId: VirtualClusters_Update
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VirtualClusterNameParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionIdParameter"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersionParameter"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualClusterUpdate"
        description: The requested managed instance resource state.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully updated the virtual cluster.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualCluster"
              examples:
                Update virtual cluster with tags:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Update_virtual_cluster_with_tags"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        default:
          description: >-
            *** Error Responses: ***

             * 400 SubscriptionNotFound - The requested subscription was not found.

             * 400 ManagementServiceFeatureDisabled - User attempted to use a feature which is disabled.

             * 404 ResourceDoesNotExist - Resource with the name '{0}' does not exist. To continue, specify a valid resource name.

             * 404 VirtualClusterNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - specified virtual cluster does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

             * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveVirtualCluster - The requested virtual cluster was not found

             * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

             * 409 ConflictingVirtualClusterOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the virtual cluster.

             * 429 ConflictingSubscriptionOperation - An operation is currently in progress for the subscription.
      tags:
        - VirtualClusters
      x-ms-long-running-operation: true
servers:
  - url: https://management.azure.com
components:
  examples:
    List_virtualClusters:
      value:
        value:
          - id: /subscriptions/20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
            location: westeurope
            name: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
            properties:
              childResources:
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance1
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance2
              family: Gen4
              subnetId: /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1
            type: Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters
          - id: /subscriptions/20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/vc-subnet2-14b795bd-9c8f-46ec-adb8-2b8eff56ac16
            location: westeurope
            name: vc-subnet1-14b795bd-9c8f-46ec-adb8-2b8eff56ac16
            properties:
              childResources:
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance3
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance4
              family: Gen5
              subnetId: /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/vnet2/subnets/subnet2
            type: Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters
    List_virtual_clusters_by_resource_group:
      value:
        value:
          - id: /subscriptions/20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
            location: westeurope
            name: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
            properties:
              childResources:
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance1
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance2
              family: Gen4
              subnetId: /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1
            type: Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters
          - id: /subscriptions/20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/vc-subnet2-14b795bd-9c8f-46ec-adb8-2b8eff56ac16
            location: westeurope
            name: vc-subnet1-14b795bd-9c8f-46ec-adb8-2b8eff56ac16
            properties:
              childResources:
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance3
                - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance4
              family: Gen4
              subnetId: /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/vnet2/subnets/subnet2
            type: Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters
    Get_virtual_cluster:
      value:
        id: /subscriptions/20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
        location: westeurope
        name: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
        properties:
          childResources:
            - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance1
            - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance2
          family: Gen4
          subnetId: /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1
        type: Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters
    Update_virtual_cluster_with_tags:
      value:
        id: /subscriptions/20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters/vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
        location: westeurope
        name: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
        properties:
          childResources:
            - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance1
            - /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/testinstance2
          subnetId: /subscriptions/20D7082A-0FC7-4468-82BD-542694D5042B/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1
        tags:
          tagKey1: TagValue1
        type: Microsoft.Sql/virtualClusters
  parameters:
    ApiVersionParameter:
      description: The API version to use for the request.
      in: query
      name: api-version
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: client
      schema:
        type: string
      examples:
        List virtualClusters:
          value: 2015-05-01-preview
        List virtual clusters by resource group:
          value: 2015-05-01-preview
        Delete virtual cluster:
          value: 2015-05-01-preview
        Get virtual cluster:
          value: 2015-05-01-preview
        Update virtual cluster with tags:
          value: 2015-05-01-preview
    BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter:
      description: The name of the blob auditing policy.
      in: path
      name: blobAuditingPolicyName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - default
    DatabaseNameParameter:
      description: The name of the database.
      in: path
      name: databaseName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
    ManagedInstanceNameParameter:
      description: The name of the managed instance.
      in: path
      name: managedInstanceName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
    ResourceGroupParameter:
      description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can
        obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
      in: path
      name: resourceGroupName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
      examples:
        List virtual clusters by resource group:
          value: testrg
        Delete virtual cluster:
          value: testrg
        Get virtual cluster:
          value: testrg
        Update virtual cluster with tags:
          value: testrg
    ServerNameParameter:
      description: The name of the server.
      in: path
      name: serverName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
    SqlVirtualMachineContainerNameParameter:
      description: The name of the SqlVirtualMachineContainer.
      in: path
      name: sqlVirtualMachineContainerName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
    SqlVirtualMachineInstanceNameParameter:
      description: The name of the SqlVirtualMachineInstance.
      in: path
      name: sqlVirtualMachineInstanceName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
    SubscriptionIdParameter:
      description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
      in: path
      name: subscriptionId
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: client
      schema:
        type: string
      examples:
        List virtualClusters:
          value: 20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b
        List virtual clusters by resource group:
          value: 20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b
        Delete virtual cluster:
          value: 20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b
        Get virtual cluster:
          value: 20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b
        Update virtual cluster with tags:
          value: 20d7082a-0fc7-4468-82bd-542694d5042b
    VirtualClusterNameParameter:
      description: The name of the virtual cluster.
      in: path
      name: virtualClusterName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
      examples:
        Delete virtual cluster:
          value: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
        Get virtual cluster:
          value: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
        Update virtual cluster with tags:
          value: vc-subnet1-f769ed71-b3ad-491a-a9d5-26eeceaa6be2
  securitySchemes:
    azure_auth:
      description: Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        implicit:
          authorizationUrl: https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/authorize
          scopes:
            user_impersonation: impersonate your user account
  schemas:
    Resource:
      description: ARM resource.
      properties:
        id:
          description: Resource ID.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        name:
          description: Resource name.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        type:
          description: Resource type.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
      type: object
      x-ms-azure-resource: true
    TrackedResource:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Resource"
      description: ARM tracked top level resource.
      properties:
        location:
          description: Resource location.
          type: string
          x-ms-mutability:
            - read
            - create
        tags:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          description: Resource tags.
          type: object
      required:
        - location
      type: object
    VirtualCluster:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/TrackedResource"
      description: An Azure SQL virtual cluster.
      properties:
        properties:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualClusterProperties"
      required:
        - location
      type: object
    VirtualClusterListResult:
      description: A list of virtual clusters.
      properties:
        nextLink:
          description: Link to retrieve next page of results.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        value:
          description: Array of results.
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualCluster"
          readOnly: true
          type: array
      type: object
    VirtualClusterProperties:
      description: The properties of a virtual cluster.
      properties:
        childResources:
          description: List of resources in this virtual cluster.
          items:
            type: string
          readOnly: true
          type: array
        family:
          description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same
            SKU, then that can be captured here.
          type: string
        subnetId:
          description: Subnet resource ID for the virtual cluster.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
      type: object
    VirtualClusterUpdate:
      description: An update request for an Azure SQL Database virtual cluster.
      properties:
        properties:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/VirtualClusterProperties"
        tags:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          description: Resource tags.
          type: object
      type: object
